page.description: The ID of a Panel to display when the device orientation is 'Landscape'. Only available if the *[link:Navigator type@ux panel navigator type]* for the Panel Navigator is set to *[ui:OrientationChange]*.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Landscape orientation Panel]* property specifies a Panel - Panel Card, Panel Layout, or Panel Navigator - to display when the device orientation is 'Landscape'. This allows you to specify a separate portrait and landscape layout based on the device's orientation. The *[ui:Navigator type]* must be set to *[ui:OrientationChange]* in order to specify separate portrait and landscape layouts.

videos.title: Automatically Changing the Entire Layout of the UX Component on a Device Orientation Change Event
videos.description: A common design pattern in mobile applications is to have completely different screen layouts depending on the device orientation. In this video, we show how the Panel Navigator can be used to easily do this.
